name: What The Maze
description:
Imagine you are in an experiment that pushes you to your limits.
Which takes your breath away.
Which will kill you in the worst case ..
This is the "What The Maze" experiment!
You wake up in front of the gate of a gigantic maze and
have something to eat and drink. The gate opens and before
you are in the labyrinth it closes again. You are trapped
You don't know what to expect in the labyrinth. Is it true
that this was all just an experiment? Or do the machines want
to bring you underground? Find out!



Getting started:

As soon as you arrive in the game, you'll hear a mysterious voice instructing you. Listen to it carefully, because it won't repeat itself and will give you information about the maze. This information may or may not be true. You have a small starting capital of food and drink. You also have a battery. In this world, batteries are slightly larger. The gate opens after about a minute. Then your survival instincts are needed.



Graves:

I was once told that there are graves hidden in the labyrinth. There are buried those who have tried this experiment before you. You must find them all because there are relics hidden there. I think you have to find them all. It can be very hard, but you can get some friends to help you. Yes! You can choose up to 3 friends to do this experiment with you.
